attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The whole world knows what Mugabe is doing to Zimbabwe. NOW is the time to get rid of this creature. I am sure that if he was removed(one way or another) no sane minded person would object. International laws do not apply when it suits Mugabe so why do they apply when it might not. Act now get rid of him.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
